entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kamloops Airport 06:00 AM PDT Thursday 21 April 2016

Temperature: 11.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 64.4 km
Humidity: 67 %

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High 24. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 21 April 2016
